text_en: The first step when learning braille is to be aware the six points a letter consist.
Training the tactile senses are important when the vision is reduced.
Creating your own letters on a slate is the next step.
Perkins braillemachine is n important to tool to master.
It's nice to have a peer in the classroom that can read aloud what is written on the blackboard.
Then you can be a part of an inclusive class!
